text.sentence: (They) did not help (her/him) clear the chacra earlier today.
text.morphology:
orokinyamawanke [VERB] oro[VRoot] kin[+Assoc] yama[+Neg] wan[+Pst1] ke[+Cmpl]

text.sentence: Jatian ja bake xontako iki moa wikenéya, koriya, bekenéya, jonxeya, jatibiya; moa kikini raota.
Then the young girl already has designs on her legs, a lip ornament, designs on her face, wrist ornaments, everything; she (is) very well adorned.
